column4: Someone know how to change the default C compiler? Because I keep getting this error: checking for C compiler default output... configure: error: C compiler cannot create executables
you are shure that you have a C compiler installed (sudo aptitude install build-essential
will get you all you need)
yes.. I have gcc installed
ok. is it make or configure that fails?
configure
ah, could you post a bit more of the error in pastebin?
thats the only error :/
i'll try that sudo aptitude install build-essential
is that the only output from configure?
no.. but the rest are no errors.. they are all positive
it might not help you, but most configure errors comes from missing header files.
I'll try..
may I ask what you are compiling?
Irssi atm.. but I tried it before and it didnt work then
that aptitude worked! Thanks!
great!
woot.. thanks!
Is there a difference between apt-get and aptitude?
aptitude will remove dependecies if you remove an application that you installed with aptitude.
ah ok.. thanks again
